This repository contains the materials for the training session about "Mastering Web Scraping for Data Collection" held during [MethodsNET workshop](https://methodsnet.org/workshop/methods-development-and-innovation-workshops/) in October 2024 at UC Louvain.

You will find [here](./slides/slides.html) the slides of the training session and [here](./exercises/) the R scripts of the difference exercises proposed during the session. You can install all the required packages in advance by running the [setup script](./setup.R).
